name: CabbageClimber
description:
Made for Alakajam 7

Climb an endless series of rooms in a tower inspired by the Discordian tarot major arcana. Face the beasts and priests of the five biomes: Sweet, Boom, Pungent, Prickle, and Orange!

You are a cabbage climbing a tower with little to defend yourself besides jumping on your enemies. 

A/D or arrows to move, space or up to jump. Double jump enabled.

Untested controller Support

Made with Godot, Gimp, and Audacity
